column4: On Hardy, totem (gstreamer) is playing an encrypted DVD in black and white, with a green bar along the bottom.  Mplayer works fine with the same DVD.  How can I "un-fuck" totem?
you can try changing gstreamer's video output settings with gstreamer-properties (that command is part of the "gnome-media" package in the repo's)
upon advice from #emacs, I tried totem-xine, and it works fine.  I've stopped caring about this issue for now.
